text: كَانُواْ لَا يَتَنَاهَوۡنَ عَن مُّنكَرٖ فَعَلُوهُۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

translation.en: They used not to prevent one another from wrongdoing that they did. How wretched was that which they were doing
translation.id: Mereka tidak saling mencegah perbuatan mungkar yang selalu mereka perbuat. Sungguh, sangat buruk apa yang mereka perbuat
